      • remove_extra_precision

        public static java.lang.String remove_extra_precision(java.lang.String value)
        Removes extra zeros in decimal eg. for 0.10000000000004 it will return 0.10
        Parameters:
        value - (String) floating point value
        Returns:
        result by reducing decimal value if it has consecutive 6 zeros

      • toPostFix

        Returns:

      • toStringArray

        public static java.lang.String[] toStringArray(java.lang.String infix_string)
        breaks infix string to string array of its operands and operators eg. "a+b*c*(d+e)" to {"a","+","b","*","c","(","d","+","e",")"}
        Parameters:
        infix_string - (String) a correct infix string
        Returns:
        (String[]) array of string(operands and operators)

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String infix_string)

        Parameters:
        infix_string - (String) infix string to evaluate
        Returns:
        (boolean) true if it is valid expression else false
